plugins.name: Fancy Text Generator
plugins.description:
✨ What It Does

The Fancy Text Generator instantly transforms your plain text into beautiful, stylized typography using Unicode characters.


Get multiple licenses ->


Perfect For

  1. Social Media Designers - Create eye-catching posts and stories
  2. UI/UX Designers - Add unique typography to interfaces
  3. Brand Designers - Develop distinctive text treatments
  4. Content Creators - Make text that stands out
  5. Anyone who wants to make their text more interesting!


⚡ Key Features

  1. 75+ Text Transformations
  2. Classic Styles: Old English, Medieval, Cursive, Bold, Italic
  3. Unicode Magic: Circles, Squares, Bubbles, Strikethrough
  4. Creative Effects: Upside-down, Mirror, Creepy/Glitch text
  5. Fun Styles: Cute text with emojis, Vaporwave aesthetic
  6. Mathematical: Subscript, Superscript, Double-struc
  7. And many more!


Seamless Figma Integration

  1. Real-time Preview - See transformations as you type
  2. One-Click Insert - Add text directly to your canvas
  3. Smart Font Detection - Automatically finds the best font for each style
  4. Perfect Positioning - Text appears centered in your viewport


Instant Results

  1. Type once, get 75+ variations instantly
  2. No font files to download or install
  3. Works with any text in any language
  4. Fast performance


How It Works

  1. Type Your Text - Enter any text in the input field
  2. Browse Styles - Instantly see 75+ fancy variations
  3. Insert to Figma - Click any style to add it to your canvas
  4. Copy text - Click to copy the generated text
  5. Customize - Adjust size, color, and positioning as needed in Figma


💡 Use Cases

  1. Social Media: 𝒴𝑜𝓊𝓇 𝒷𝓇𝒶𝓃𝒹 𝒽𝑒𝓇𝑒 for Instagram bios and posts
  2. Gaming: 🅶🅰🅼🅴🆁 🆃🅰🅶 for Twitch overlays and gaming content
  3. Branding: 𝔜𝔬𝔲𝔯 ℭ𝔬𝔪𝔭𝔞𝔫𝔶 for unique logo treatments
  4. Fun Projects: 🐙😎 ƈяαzу тєχт 🌷🐙 for creative designs


🎨 Sample Transformations

From "Hello World" to:

𝓗𝓮𝓵𝓵𝓸 𝓦𝓸𝓻𝓵𝓭 (Cursive)

🅷🅴🅻🅻🅾 🆆🅾🆁🅻🅳 (Squared)

ʜᴇʟʟᴏ ᴡᴏʀʟᴅ (Small Caps)

H⃣e⃣l⃣l⃣o⃣ W⃣o⃣r⃣l⃣d⃣ (Circled)

𝒽𝑒𝓁𝓁𝑜 𝓌𝑜𝓇𝓁𝒹 (Script)

🐙💜 ɦ𝔢𝓵𝓵𝓸 山𝓸ⓡⓛđ 🐣💚 (Crazy Style)


Technical Details

  1. Not all charachters are compatible with Figma's text system
  2. Automatic font optimization for Unicode characters
  3. Real-time text transformation engine

accepted.name: Eugenio Ciccale
accepted.description:
I'm a Product Designer & Front-end developer creating Figma Plugins to enhance your creative workflows

https://shop.plusuidesign.com/

plugins.tagline: 75+ stunning Unicode text transformations, create unique headlines, add personality to your designs

plugins.name: Color Name Finder
plugins.description:
Ever wondered what your design colors are called? Select a layer, and this plugin tells you the exact name. Make your designs more expressive!


Perfect for every designer, developer, and accessibility experts.


  1. Fast: Instantly find color names
  2. Minimal: Clean, no-clutter UI
  3. Accurate: Precise color name detection



🚀 Upcoming features:

  1. 1-click copy color name
  2. Auto-rename layers by color name


Acknowledgments:

This plugin is powered by Name That Color open source library by Chirag Mehta.

accepted.name: Heeren Darji
accepted.description:
Hey! 👋 I'm Heeren, a voracious reader and frequent page eater.

I want to craft beautiful interfaces and experiences that leave lasting impressions.

plugins.tagline: What’s That Color Called? Find out in a click!

plugins.name: MultiSelect Plus
plugins.description:
MultiSelect Plus helps you select multiple layers faster and easier than ever before.


Key Features:

• Select multiple layers as search criteria

• Find matching layers across your entire document

• Support for all layer types including shapes, components, and text


Perfect for designers working with:

• Repetitive element structures

• Batch updates and modifications

• Design file cleanup and organization


How to Use:

1. Select any layer on your canvas

2. Add more Layers to use it as your search criteria

3. Click "Find & Select" to highlight all matching layers

4. Use the history panel to quickly reuse


Boost your workflow efficiency by selecting exactly what you need in seconds!
plugins.tagline: Do something that goes beyond "selecting matching layers”

plugins.name: Frame Presets
plugins.description:
This free plugin allows the user to create frames with a specified name, width, and height in the 'Create New Preset' tab. The user can then scroll through their presets in the 'View & Alter Presets' tab or use the search bar for their convenience. Additionally, in the 'View & Alter Presets' tab by clicking on the preset's name the user will be able to confirm the preset's information and apply that frame within their Figma file. Each preset also provides the user with the option to edit its parameters or delete it from local memory.


https://www.buymeacoffee.com/cuddlybeast
plugins.tagline: Create, delete, edit, and apply your own custom frame presets.

113208.tagline: Create, delete, edit, and apply your own custom frame presets.

plugins.name: Hue Converter
plugins.description:
Hue converter plugin uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen and ensure consistency between the design and the in-vehicle screen colors.


You can select a single element or the entire interface, scan it, convert individual colors or all of them, and even convert the colors of the entire page.
plugins.tagline: Uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen

107922.name: Hue Converter
107922.description:
Hue converter plugin uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen and ensure consistency between the design and the in-vehicle screen colors.


You can select a single element or the entire interface, scan it, convert individual colors or all of them, and even convert the colors of the entire page.
107922.tagline: Uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen

plugins.name: Gridder
plugins.description:
A simple tool to generate grids and/or sort layers in ascending or descending layer name order.


How to use


Sorting: Select a group of layers, then select the sort direction.

Gridding: Select a group of layers, then select either the column count or row count. Then adjust the spacing values.


Combine the two use for rapid organized grid creation and maintenance.


From yours truly,

Ryan Nono
plugins.tagline: A simple tool to generate grids and/or sort layers in ascending or descending layer name order.

104536.name: Gridder
104536.description:

Gridding: Select a group of layers, then select either the column count or row count. Then adjust the spacing values.


Combine the two use for rapid organized grid creation and maintenance.


From yours truly,

Ryan Nono
104536.tagline: A simple tool to generate grids and/or sort layers in ascending or descending layer name order.

plugins.name: Hunch - Figma export for Hunch Creative Studio
plugins.description:
It is used to export Figma frames to Hunch Studio templates. By export you can expect .zip file with JSON data & all images used in the design.


It is primarily used by Hunch clients whose designers are working in Figma so they do not need to recreate a design in Hunch Studio while trying to scale the production and variants.

For more info visit:

www.hunchads.com
plugins.tagline: Import your Figma creatives into Hunch Creative Studio

123558.name: Hunch - Figma export for Hunch Creative Studio
123558.description:
It is used to export Figma frames to Hunch Studio templates. By export you can expect .zip file with JSON data & all images used in the design.


It is primarily used by Hunch clients whose designers are working in Figma so they do not need to recreate a design in Hunch Studio while trying to scale the production and variants.

For more info visit:

www.hunchads.com
123558.tagline: Import your Figma creatives into Hunch Creative Studio

plugins.name: FigVar - Generate Multiple Variables Instantly
plugins.description:
Welcome to creating variables supaa fast!


Say goodbye to repetitive tasks and manual adjustments. With our plugin, you can create variables effortlessly across your designs, saving valuable time and effort. Focus on the creative aspects of your work while we handle the tedious parts.


How to Use:

  1. Run the Plugin
  2. Select Between Color Variables and Number Variables
  3. Provide a Base Color or Number
  4. Add a Collection Name (Optional)
  5. Add to an Existing Collection (Optional)
  6. Save as Variable (Optional) – If unchecked, it will be saved as a color style
  7. Group Name (Optional)


Need help? I've written a dedicated guide addressing the most frequently asked questions↗ about the plugin. Please have a read before adding comments to the plugin page.
plugins.tagline: Generate multiple color and number variables in one click

plugins.name: Organize Wiz
plugins.description:
Stop staring at a blank canvas and dive straight into design with Organise Wiz. Our Figma plugin streamlines your workflow by automating tedious setup tasks.


Effortless Page Management:

  • Ditch the clunky process. Create, name, and organise pages with lightning speed.
  • Build a crystal-clear project structure that's intuitive for you and your team.


Blazing-Fast Templates:

  • No more starting from scratch. Launch projects with pre-built, customisable templates designed for your specific needs.
  • Hit the ground running every single time, no matter the project.


Unleash Your Creative Potential:

  • Focus on what you do best – crafting phenomenal designs.
  • Organise Wiz automates the setup drudgery, freeing up valuable time to unleash your creative vision.


Imagine the possibilities. More time spent designing, less time spent organising. Happier designers, more efficient projects. That's the Organise Wiz magic.

accepted.name: Harshvardhan Agarwal
accepted.description: Engineer turned designer, I blend technical know-how with user-centered design principles to tackle product design challenges.

plugins.tagline: Effortless page management unlocks creativity

plugins.name: Randominator
plugins.description:
🎨 Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


✨ Features:


🎯 Transform Properties

• Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

• Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180° to 180°

• Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


🎨 Color Properties

• Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

• Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

• Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


📑 Layer Management

• Randomize layer stacking order

• Works with multiple selected objects

• Maintains object center positions


🔄 Perfect for:

• Creating design variations

• Generating unique patterns

• Exploring different color combinations

• Adding organic movement to your designs

• Quick prototyping and ideation


💡 Pro Tips:

• Select multiple objects to randomize them together

• Use small ranges for subtle variations

• Combine different properties for unique results

• Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups
plugins.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

132327.name: Randominator
132327.description:
🎨 Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


✨ Features:


🎯 Transform Properties

• Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

• Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180° to 180°

• Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


🎨 Color Properties

• Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

• Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

• Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


📑 Layer Management

• Randomize layer stacking order

• Works with multiple selected objects

• Maintains object center positions


🔄 Perfect for:

• Creating design variations

• Generating unique patterns

• Exploring different color combinations

• Adding organic movement to your designs

• Quick prototyping and ideation


💡 Pro Tips:

• Select multiple objects to randomize them together

• Use small ranges for subtle variations

• Combine different properties for unique results

• Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups
132327.release_notes:
🎉 New Update: Randominator v1.1.0

We're excited to bring you new randomization features to make your designs even more dynamic!

✨ New Features:
• Rotation Randomization: Add random rotation to your selected elements with customizable min/max angles
• Layer Order Randomization: Shuffle the stacking order of your selected layers for quick variations
• Improved Scale Behavior: More intuitive scaling with better default values

🛠️ UI Improvements:
• Updated interface layout for better usability
• Reset default color randomization values for more predictable results
• Enhanced slider controls for better precision

Try these new features by selecting multiple elements and adjusting the rotation range or enabling layer order randomization in the plugin panel.

Happy randomizing! 🎨
132327.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

plugins.name: Maskily - Smart Mask
plugins.description:
Maskily🎭📄


🚀 Enhance your Figma workflow with powerful masking tools and seamless JSON export! Whether you're a designer or developer, Maskily Exporter helps you create precise masks while effortlessly exporting structured JSON data from your designs.


✨ Key Features:

✅ Smart Masking – Apply, modify, and manage masks with ease.

✅ JSON Export – Extract structured design data for frontend integration.

✅ Intuitive UI – Simple, fast, and efficient masking & export process.

✅ Optimized for Devs & Designers – Perfect for UI/UX workflows and handoff.


💡 Perfect for:

UI/UX Designers – Create polished, masked visuals effortlessly.

Developers – Export structured design data in JSON for seamless integration.

Creative Teams – Speed up workflow with powerful masking & data extraction.


🔥 Start using MaskPro Exporter today and take your Figma workflow to the next level!
plugins.tagline: Mask, Creat, Export

plugins.name: GradCover
plugins.description:
"Cover Gradient Pro is a Figma plugin crafted specifically for users looking to enhance their design documents with eye-catching gradient covers. Whether it's for branding manuals, product catalogs, or personal portfolios, this plugin assists in swiftly creating professional and visually striking cover designs.


With Cover Gradient Pro, you can expect:


A rich palette of gradient options to diversify your cover design choices.

One-click cover generation to streamline the design process and save valuable time.

Highly customizable gradient features, allowing you to adjust colors and effects to fit your design needs.

Seamless integration with Figma, ensuring your cover designs blend perfectly with your project documents.

To use Cover Gradient Pro, simply select the elements you wish to apply a gradient to, and use the plugin's intuitive controls to choose and adjust your preferred gradient for your cover. Transform your designs with the power of Cover Gradient Pro and give your work the standout cover it deserves."

accepted.name: walden
accepted.description: A UX designer full of whimsical ideas.

plugins.tagline: "Cover Gradient Pro - Add Professional Covers to Your Designs"

113610.name: GradCover
113610.description:
"Cover Gradient Pro is a Figma plugin crafted specifically for users looking to enhance their design documents with eye-catching gradient covers. 113610.tagline: "Cover Gradient Pro - Add Professional Covers to Your Designs"

plugins.name: Stronde for Email – Figma Images in Mobile & Dark-Mode HTML Emails (ESP Integration: HubSpot, Klaviy
plugins.description:
What is Stronde for Email’s Figma Plugin?

The Stronde for Email Figma Plugin lets you export Figma images directly into Stronde for Email and/or your ESP (Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Pardot, Marketo, HubSpot, Klaviyo, and more). These images are then added to HTML emails, already optimized for mobile and dark mode.


Stronde for Email is a powerful email creation platform designed to simplify email design and collaboration for marketing teams, agencies, and enterprises. It enables teams to build, approve, and sync marketing emails seamlessly across platforms.


📌 Learn more about our customers: strondeforemail.com/customers/

📌 Explore our integrations: strondeforemail.com/integrations/

📌 Discover Stronde for Email features: strondeforemail.com/


Why Use Stronde for Email’s Figma Plugin?

  1. 🚀 One-click export – Send Figma images directly to Stronde for Email.
  2. 🔄 ESP Integration – Supports Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Pardot, Oracle Eloqua, Marketo, HubSpot, MailChimp, Klaviyo, and more.
  3. 🎨 Supports any type of graphic – As long as it fits within the dimensions set, export with ease.


How Does It Work?

  1. Create your visuals in Figma.
  2. Export images directly to Stronde for Email. If integrated with your ESP, you’ll also find them in your ESP’s media library.
  3. Use them in the HTML email templates available—fully optimized for mobile and dark mode.
  4. Send high-performing emails without needing to manually download, upload, and test images in your ESP.


Features

✅ Direct Figma-to-ESP export – Save time with seamless workflow integration.

✅ Optimized for HTML emails – Ensure images fit and render correctly in email clients.

✅ ESP-ready – Works with Salesforce, Pardot, Marketo, HubSpot, Klaviyo, and more.

✅ Cloud-based storage – Organize images in the Stronde for Email library.

✅ Perfect for agencies & teams – Anyone can use it, from designers to marketers.


📌 See how teams use Stronde for Email: strondeforemail.com/customers/


FAQ

How does this help with HTML email optimization?

  1. The plugin automatically compresses, scales, and formats images correctly for HTML email campaigns
  2. Images are never too big or too small, so you don’t have to double-check file requirements before launching campaigns.


Does this require coding knowledge?

  1. No! Simply export images from Figma and use them in your email templates—no developer needed.


Is this free to use?

  1. The plugin itself is free, but you’ll need a paid Stronde for Email subscription to access full HTML email functionalities.


What ESPs does the Stronde for Email support?

  1. Stronde for Email integrates with Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Pardot, Oracle Eloqua, Marketo, HubSpot, Klaviyo, MailChimp, and more.


📌 Check out all Stronde for Email integrations: strondeforemail.com/integrations/

plugins.name: Bootstrap Icons Search Plugin for Figma | Free & Fast
plugins.description:
🚀 Supercharge your Figma designs with instant access to over 2,000 free Bootstrap Icons!


The Bootstrap Icons Search plugin empowers you to effortlessly browse, search, and insert any icon from the comprehensive Bootstrap Icons library—right within Figma.


🎯 Key Features:


🔎 Comprehensive Icon Library: Access the complete Bootstrap Icons collection, featuring over 2,000 free SVG icons.


⚡ Powerful Search Functionality: Quickly find the perfect icon using intuitive keyword search.


🎨 One-Click Insertion: Easily insert icons into your designs with a single click.


🧭 User-Friendly Interface: Navigate and utilize the plugin with ease, thanks to its intuitive design.


🧩 Design Consistency: Maintain a cohesive look by using icons that align with Bootstrap's design standards.


Ideal for designers and teams aiming to accelerate their design process and uphold UI consistency with Bootstrap standards.

plugins.name: GradientForge - Free mesh gradients
plugins.description:
This tool allows you to create beautiful mesh gradients with customizable color points. You can:

  1. Add and remove color points
  2. Adjust colors using the color picker
  3. Change the aspect ratio
  4. Save your gradients as PNG files

The gradients are generated using WebGL and RBF interpolation for smooth performance and high-quality output.


Website version: https://pkolesnikov.com/meshgradients
plugins.tagline: Customizable gradients generator

  3. enhance design flexibility for icons, buttons, and graphic elements
  4. streamline the process of creating intricate border effects


if you have feedback or run into any bugs, dm me on twitter @coleschfr :)


happy designing!

plugins.name: Rename Code Syntax (Web/iOS/Android)
plugins.description:
Convert Figma variables to developer-ready code syntax in one click!


Features


🚀 Platform-specific outputs:


  1. Web: var(--color-primary) (CSS)
  2. iOS: colorPrimary (Swift)
  3. Android: color_primary (Kotlin/XML)


🔧 Customization:


  1. Add prefixes like color- or btn-
  2. Choose word dividers (-, _, or custom)
  3. Override default formats (kebab/camel/snake case)


🛠️ Smart formatting:


  1. Handles spaces and special characters (e.g., /)
  2. Works across variable collections
  3. Dark/light mode support


Why developers and designers love it:


  1. Saves hours of manual renaming
  2. Ensures naming consistency across platforms
  3. Perfect for design system maintenance


Usage Instructions


1- Select a variable collection

2- Choose your target platform (Web/iOS/Android)

3- Customize formatting (optional):

  1. Prefix: Add a prefix like color-
  2. Divider: Replace spaces// with -, _, etc.
  3. Format: Override default platform formats

4- Click "Update Variables" – done!


Support & Feedback

"Found a bug? Have feature requests? Reach out at gmazzo@gmail.com


Privacy Notes

"This plugin does NOT collect user data or connect to external servers."
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma variables to developer-ready code syntax in one click!

plugins.name: Color Palette Generator
plugins.description:
🎨 Color Palette Generator – Your Ultimate Color Companion for Figma


Effortlessly create stunning and harmonious color palettes with the enhanced Color Palette Generator. Whether you’re designing for web, mobile, or branding, this plugin offers everything you need from simple color schemes to complex, accessible palettes.


💡 Key Features:


🎯 Palette Generation:

  1. Generate palettes by keyword, random, triadic, analogous, complementary, split-complementary, tetradic, or warm soothing pastels.
  2. Explore color harmony with an interactive color wheel and adjustable saturation/lightness sliders.
  3. Extract colors from images with customizable settings for color count, threshold, and brightness.


⚡ Palette Management:

  1. Apply palettes directly to Figma layers.
  2. Save, load, and delete palettes for future use.


🧑‍💻 Accessibility & Simulation:

  1. Accessibility Check for WCAG contrast compliance.
  2. Color Blindness Simulation (Protanopia, Deuteranopia, Tritanopia) for inclusive design.


🌟 Enhanced UI Experience:

  1. Tabs for basic, pro and image features.
  2. Dark Mode support for seamless design workflows.
  3. User Notifications for real-time feedback.


💥 Design smarter, faster, and more inclusively directly in Figma.


Enhance your design process and craft stunning color combinations with the Color Palette Generator plugin!
plugins.tagline: Effortless color harmony for your designs—generate, apply, and export palettes in one click!

plugins.name: Chordio: AI Design Review Copilot
plugins.description:
Chordio – Your AI UX Reviewer


Built by the creators of InVision’s Design System Manager and backed by Y Combinator, Chordio helps you ship confidently with less guesswork.


Chordio is an AI-powered UX reviewer that audits your designs with deep understanding of your brand and guidelines.


Spot issues early – Uncover usability flaws, UX friction, and missed requirements before your work hits the spotlight.


Boost copy and conversion – Get clear, actionable recommendations to tighten messaging and drive results.


Stay on-brand – Automatically audit visuals, tone, and layout against your brand system.


Keep your momentum – Skip the back-and-forth and avoid context switching while waiting on feedback.


Stress less – Catch edge cases before they become last-minute emergencies.


Design smarter. Review faster. Stay the in flow — with Chordio.
plugins.tagline: Get instant feedback on UX copy, best practices, and design system compliance

plugins.name: Text Calculator
plugins.description:
Text Calculator allows Figma users to perform mathematical operations directly within text layers.


The plugin keeps the text layer's original styles intact, including fonts and applied text styles.


To use, simply select a text layer, type your formula (e.g., 5+5), and click the "Calculate" button.


Perfect for designers needing quick calculations while maintaining design consistency.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly perform calculations in text layers.

plugins.name: Apply variable modes to all pages
plugins.description:
Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!

Perfect for designers and teams working with design tokens, themes, or variable-based workflows.


How to use

1 - Go to a page (or create one) that has the desired variable modes applied

2 - Click "Apply this to all pages" / "Remove modes from all pages"


Done! You have easily copied the variable modes applied to your current page and apply them to all pages in your file with a single click.
plugins.tagline: Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!

115401.name: Apply variable modes to all pages
115401.description:
Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!

Perfect for designers and teams working with design tokens, themes, or variable-based workflows.


How to use

1 - Go to a page (or create one) that has the desired variable modes applied

2 - Click "Apply this to all pages" / "Remove modes from all pages"


Done! You have easily copied the variable modes applied to your current page and apply them to all pages in your file with a single click.

plugins.name: Figma To Rust
plugins.description:
Figma To Rust Plugin Export

Streamline your design-to-development workflow with the Figma To Rust Plugin Export. This powerful plugin bridges the gap between your creative designs in Figma and the robust interface code needed for Rust plugins.


Features:

  1. Seamless Export: Easily export your Figma sketches directly into interface code tailored for Rust plugins.
  2. Time-Saving: Reduce the manual effort required to translate designs into code, allowing you to focus more on creativity and functionality.
  3. Consistent Design: Ensure that your Rust plugin interfaces maintain the same visual fidelity as your original Figma designs.
  4. Easy Integration: Integrate the exported code effortlessly into your existing Rust projects, making it a breeze to update and iterate on your designs.


How It Works:

  1. Design in Figma: Create your interface designs using Figma's intuitive tools.
  2. Export with Plugin: Use the Figma To Rust Plugin Export to convert your designs into Rust-compatible interface code.
  3. Implement in Rust: Import the generated code into your Rust project and start building your plugin with a solid visual foundation.


Ideal For:

  1. Developers looking to accelerate the development process for Rust plugins.
  2. Designers who want to ensure their designs are accurately represented in the final product.
  3. Teams seeking to improve collaboration between design and development phases.


Experience the efficiency and accuracy of the Figma To Rust Plugin Export today and elevate your plugin development process to new heights!
plugins.tagline: Allows you to export your sketches from Figma to interface code for Rust plugins

122807.description:

plugins.name: Better Title Case
plugins.description:
Not a fan of built-in Figma's title case? Better Title Case got your back!


  1. Select a frame or a group to apply Better Title Case to all text layers inside
  2. Or directly select one or several text layers to apply Better Title Case only to these layers


Safe to use on text layers that have several styles/properties applied to them — plugin will not remove bold or underlined text from your layers.


Current Capitalization Rules:

  1. UPPERCASE words are not processed, so AAPL or MBA will stay as is.
  2. The first and the last word in a sentence are always processed.
  3. There is a custom list of words that shouldn’t be in converted to Title Case: and, as, but, for, if, nor, or, so, yet, a, an, the, as, at, by, for, in, of, off, on, per, to, up, via, vs, v, (vs.) (v.)
  4. Word after em dash and slash processed even if it's a minor word.


If you have any feedback or ideas on improving the plugin — feel free to reach out via email or in comment section 😉.
plugins.tagline: Title Case Plugin We All Deserve

106022.name: Better Title Case
106022.description:

plugins.name: Figma to PowerFX theme converter
plugins.description:
Easily transform your Figma variables into reusable themes for Power Apps with our plugin. Figma to Power FX theme converter is a tool for Power Apps designers and developers who want to streamline their workflow and save time.


Key Features:

  1. Automated Conversion: All the variables in your Figma file are automatically translates into Power FX variables while maintaining the Figma hierarchy.
  2. Collection selection: Choose the collection you want to convert into Power FX.
  3. Color Format: Choose the color format you prefer to use between RGBA and Hexadecimal


We are continuously working on improving the plugin and plan to add new parameters for even more customization in future versions.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma variables into themes for use in your Power Apps

135650.name: Figma to PowerFX theme converter
135650.description:
Easily transform your Figma variables into reusable themes for Power Apps with our plugin. Figma to Power FX theme converter is a tool for Power Apps designers and developers who want to streamline their workflow and save time.


Key Features:

  1. Automated Conversion: All the variables in your Figma file are automatically translates into Power FX variables while maintaining the Figma hierarchy.
  2. Collection selection: Choose the collection you want to convert into Power FX.
  3. Color Format: Choose the color format you prefer to use between RGBA and Hexadecimal


We are continuously working on improving the plugin and plan to add new parameters for even more customization in future versions.
135650.release_notes:
Add : 
- Users can now choose the color format to be exported

Change :
- Modes are no longer supported. Only the first mode value is exported.
- Users can choose which tokens to export and curstomize their names.
- Collections whose name begins with an underscore cannot be selected.
135650.tagline: Convert your Figma variables into themes for use in your Power Apps

plugins.name: Row Column Swap
plugins.description: Select your cluster of rows or columns of stickies, run the plugin, choose "rows to columns" or "columns to row". You will see your rows switched to columns, or vice versa, depending on what you clicked.
plugins.tagline: From rows to columns or columns to rows

83716.name: Row Column Swap
83716.description: Select your cluster of rows or columns of stickies, run the plugin, choose "rows to columns" or "columns to row". You will see your rows switched to columns, or vice versa, depending on what you clicked.
83716.tagline: From rows to columns or columns to rows

plugins.name: Figma to XState
plugins.description:
Please note: the plugin in a work in progress, read here about the roadmap and the features to implement.


I trust XState not only as a powerful development tool, but also for enabling pair programming among engineers and Product stakeholders.


Product teams do not miss much edge cases when they design features through flowcharts. At the same time, I think a Figma prototype to XState machine convert tool can speed up the initial conversion process, allowing later engineering rework the state machine with or without the designers.
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma prototypes to XState’s machine config (🚧 WIP).

77687.tagline: Transform Figma prototypes to XState’s machine config (🚧 WIP).

plugins.name: Variable Search
plugins.description:
Figma's Variables previously couldn’t be searched directly, which made it difficult when managing multiple collections and numerous variables.

But now, with the variable search feature, you can easily find and edit variables!


If you encounter any issues while using the plugin or have feedback, feel free to reach out anytime.

contact: plustypo@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: You can find each collection by searching for its variable.

128042.name: Variable Search
128042.description:

But now, with the variable search feature, you can easily find and edit variables!


If you encounter any issues while using the plugin or have feedback, feel free to reach out anytime.

plugins.name: Ten Tone - Color Generator
plugins.description:
Ten Toneは、あなたのカラーワークフローを劇的に効率化するFigmaプラグインです。


・10段階カラースケール生成

任意のベースカラーから、Mantine風の美しい10段階のカラースケールを瞬時に作成。明るい色から暗い色までバランス良く調整され、デザインの一貫性を保ちます。複数のベースカラーを指定して、一度にまとめて生成することも可能です。


・色相バリエーション生成

ベースカラーの彩度と明度を維持したまま、赤・青・緑など様々な色相のバリエーションを簡単に探求できます。アクセントカラーやテーマカラーの検討に最適です。


UIデザイン、グラフィックデザイン、資料作成など、あらゆる場面でのカラーパレット選定と配色作業を、より直感的かつスピーディーに。

Ten Toneで、色の可能性を最大限に引き出しましょう。」
plugins.tagline: カラーシステム構築を加速。スケール＆色相バリエーション生成。

Ten Toneで、色の可能性を最大限に引き出しましょう。」

plugins.name: Page Setup Wizard
plugins.description:
The Page Setup Wizard Plugin is an ultimate tool for streamlined page creation. With just a click, generate pages with preset naming conventions tailored for product design and UX research.


  • 📄 Easily add delivery page names complete with creation or update dates.
  • 🖼 The ability to create a cover page and customize other sections based on individual needs.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly set up your file pages with preset naming conventions to ensure consistency.

plugins.name: Auto Stack
plugins.description:
About


Converts your node into React component tree.


Usage


  1. Select node which you want to turn into React component tree.
  2. Run this plugin, and press the "Scan" button.
  3. You will see the code is generated!
plugins.tagline: Converts your node into react component tree.
